content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "mycelium", "quantity": 32, "index": 12}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 12, "index": 22}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 26}, {"type": "large_fern", "quantity": 10, "index": 38}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 6, "index": 41}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 15, "index": 42}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 22, "index": 45}]
thought: I have a stripped_oak_wood in my inventory which I can use to craft oak_planks. I will move it to slot 1 to begin crafting.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "mycelium", "quantity": 32, "index": 12}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 12, "index": 22}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 26}, {"type": "large_fern", "quantity": 10, "index": 38}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 6, "index": 41}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 15, "index": 42}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 22, "index": 45}]
thought: I have now crafted 4 oak_planks. I will move them into a free inventory slot (eg., 11)
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "mycelium", "quantity": 32, "index": 12}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 12, "index": 22}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 26}, {"type": "large_fern", "quantity": 10, "index": 38}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 6, "index": 41}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 15, "index": 42}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 22, "index": 45}]

thought: In order to craft a stone sword, I need to craft sticks. I have oak planks in slot 11, which can be used to craft sticks. Therefore I will move the oak planks from slot 11 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

thought: In order to craft a stone sword, I need to craft sticks. I have oak planks in slot 11, which can be used to craft sticks. Therefore I will move the oak planks from slot 11 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4

inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "mycelium", "quantity": 32, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 12, "index": 22}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 26}, {"type": "large_fern", "quantity": 10, "index": 38}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 6, "index": 41}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 15, "index": 42}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 22, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a stone sword, I need to place a blackstone block in slot 1, a stick in slot 5, and another blackstone block in slot 9. Since I have two blackstone blocks in my inventory, I will start by moving one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 14 with quantity 1
